column4: i'm trying to connect to my ipod touch by running "ipod-touch-mount" but I get "ssh: connect to host ipod port 22: No route to host" any idea why? :)
wifi on, openssh installed through cydia. i'll search the openssh-server package
Anyone could help with my notifies/buble connected problem?
i dont have the BSD subsystem package as "Installer" doesnt update anymore and it's not on cydia. could that be the problem?
what's your prob with the notify-osd?
only one bubble is seen at once
Eg. here are 2 at one moment: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/NotifyOSD?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=notification-bubble.jpg
and there should be openssh-server package in cydia's repo
have You tried ssh-ing into ipod manually?
i seem to have it installed. do i really need bsd subsystem? How do i ssh manually?
i simply want to transfer music using ubuntu. i'm trying to run "ipod-touch-mount" just because it's in howtos. what's the most decent way you can suggest for me to transfer music?
